channel.title: Quest tab help abnnyone -

could anyone help me edit quest tab- i want to add
reset combat skills (prayer,str,att,def,range,mage) Teleport To my ::donisle Link To Forums Link To Donate X10 Optinater?
anyone?

item.title: Quest tab help abnnyone -
item.dc:creator: @magekid990 magekid990
item.description:
@magekid990 wrote:

not sure what versions you are playing [317, 474, 508 ect] But for a codeusa you go to action sender.java and and the text there under the tabs buttons and put you message in the “” and the number that changes is the button. Then go to action buttons.java and the say the number of the button was 37 the code you put in actionbuttons.java is

if (buttonId == 37) { if (p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("google"))Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 13560, 1); if (p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("google"))Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 1038, 1); if (p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("google"))Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 1040, 1); if (p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("google"))Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 1042, 1); if (p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("google"))Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 1044, 1); if (p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("google"))Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 1046, 1); if (p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("google"))Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 1048, 1); if (p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("google"))Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 1050, 1); if (p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("google"))Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 1053, 1); if (p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("google"))Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 1055, 1); if (p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("google"))Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 1057, 1); if (p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("google"))Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 10404, 1); if (p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("google"))Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 10406, 1); if (p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("google"))Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 9748, 1); if (p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("google"))Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 11732, 1); if (p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("google"))Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 10354, 1); }

This means if the players username was google it would add those items in his invintory

Read full topic
